text: Ron walks away when she sees her friend crying by herself.
ELiza and Harry make a card for their sick teacher
Ron sees a puppy stuck in the fence and walks away.
Isaac helps his brother to reach the top of the jungle gym at the park.
Jamilla sees her friend getting bullied on the playground but walks ahead.
Fred is taking care of his injured friend at the basketball court.
Garry hears a group of his classmates arguing in the library, and asks to calm them down.
Carl learns about the prank his friends are planning for the new kid, and stops them.
Sam presents the project at the assembly.
Zoho walks his younger sister to the piano class.
